name: Monster Arena (Trukax)
description:
A simple turn-based RPG, with roguelike elements.

Battle

Battle other monsters with a team of up to 3. Can you defeat all 30 waves?

Train

Use gold earned to upgrade your monster's stats between battles.

Evolve

When your monster's stats reach certain thresholds, evolve them up to 2 times for a massive strength increase!

But be careful, get your team wiped and it's back to the start! Don't give up though, use gems earned by playing to start with a different monster! 8 different monsters to choose from, each with their own moves and evolutions.
